name: Tarde's Journey
description:
Tarde's Journey is a little platformer game that I made for my first game jam (IndieDevDay game jam) with the theme of "Better late than never".

Help Tarde, our cute little robot to reach their destination before the stress becomes too much for them to continue and become Nunca, the one that abandons their path.

Collect Rests that reduce the stress of our tiny protagonist so they can continue their journey.

This game tries to represent the struggle to finish something or do something later than when it was expected you to do it, and the importance of taking rests and in the end, it's better to finish late than never.

Controls

Movement: A / D or ← / → or Left controller stick
Jump: Space or "A" button (Xbox-type controller)
Exit Game: Escape or "Menu" button (Xbox-type controller)
